CustomField.description: By default, CONCAT_DISTINCT operations will only apply the concat delimiter to the parent-level rollup field. Enable this field to also split the rollup item's values before concatenating to the parent.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: By default, CONCAT_DISTINCT operations will only apply the concat delimiter to the parent-level rollup field. Enable this field to also split the rollup item's values before concatenating to the parent.
CustomField.label: Split Concat Delimiter On Calc Item?
